titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Congress should have the power to prohibit desecration of the flag of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Congress should have the power to prohibit the desecration of the U.S. flag.
